error.title: Project Loading Error
error.message: Unable to load the project. Please try again later.

message.400: The server could not process your request.
message.403: You do not have permission to view this page.
message.404: The page you are looking for might have been moved or deleted.
message.500: An unexpected error occurred on our server.
message.default: Please try again later or return to the homepage.

hero.title:
Learn by Doing,
 Not Just Watching.
hero.subtitle: Go beyond video tutorials. rOOm lets you record, replay, and run code from interactive lessons, just as if the instructor were right beside you.

features.title: A Better Way to Learn Code
features.subtitle: Our platform is built from the ground up to provide a truly hands-on learning experience that traditional videos can't match.

interactive_replays.title: Interactive Replays
interactive_replays.description: Don't just watch a video. See every keystroke, command, and file change as it happened. Pause anytime to copy code or inspect the state.

recording.title: Builtin Recorder
recording.description: Start recording your lessons with a single click. Capture every interaction, from code execution to terminal commands, and share them instantly.

live_streaming.title: Live Streaming & Collab
live_streaming.description: Join live classes where you can interact with the code in real-time. Teachers can even hand over control for a truly collaborative session.

schools_and_community.title: Schools & Community
schools_and_community.description: Create or join schools, manage multiple instructors, and build a community around your content. Monetize your expertise with ease.

learn.title: Master Any Technology
learn.subtitle: From frontend frameworks to backend systems, our growing library of interactive courses has you covered.

community.title: Ready to Share Your Knowledge?
community.subtitle: Become an instructor on rOOm and create the next generation of coding tutorials. Our all-in-one platform makes content creation fast and simple.
community.learn_subtitle: Join our community of learners and access interactive coding tutorials from expert instructors.

items.question: How is rOOm different from a regular video course?
items.answer: rOOm goes beyond video. It records every actionâ€”keystrokes, commands, and file changesâ€”allowing you to pause at any moment and interact with a fully functional code workspace, exactly as the instructor left it.

items.question: What types of courses are available?
items.answer: You can find a wide range of courses covering technologies like VueJS, NuxtJS, Python, Go, Docker, and more. Our library is constantly expanding with content from individual creators and tech schools.

items.question: Do I need to install anything to take a course?
items.answer: Absolutely not! Everything you need, including the IDE, terminal, and a secure Docker environment, runs directly in your browser. Just click play and start learning.

items.question: Can I interact with instructors and other learners?
items.answer: Yes! You can leave time-stamped comments on lessons, participate in live-streamed classes with real-time code collaboration, and join school communities to discuss topics with peers.

items.question: How do I track my progress in a course?
items.answer: Your progress is saved automatically. The platform remembers where you left off in any lesson, allowing you to easily resume your learning journey anytime, on any device.

items.question: Can I access courses on multiple devices?
items.answer: Yes, rOOm is a web-based platform. You can access your account and all your courses from any modern web browser on your desktop, laptop, or tablet.

profile.title: Profile Information
profile.validation: Name must be at least 2 characters

email.title: Change Email
email.label: New Email Address
email.toast_success_desc: A confirmation link has been sent to your new email.

validation.min_length: New password must be at least 8 characters

delete.title: Delete Account
delete.description: Once you delete your account, there is no going back. All of your data, including created courses and learning progress, will be permanently removed. Please be certain.

modal.title: Are you absolutely sure?
modal.description: This action is irreversible. To confirm, please type your username {username} in the box below.

delete.toast_success_desc: We're sorry to see you go.

errors.imageTooLarge: The image is too large. Please choose an image smaller than 2MB.
errors.invalidImageType: Please upload a valid image file (JPEG, PNG, or WebP).
errors.invalidDimensions: The image dimensions are invalid. Please upload an image between 200x200 and 4096x4096 pixels.
